Lyric:
[00:34.569]I opened my eyes last night and saw you in the low light
[00:43.229]Walking down by the bay, on the shore,
[00:47.419]staring up at the planes that aren't there anymore
[00:51.949]I was feeling the night grow old and you were looking so cold
[00:59.839]Like an introvert, I drew my over shirt
[01:04.999]Around my arms and began to shiver violently before
[01:08.179]You happened to look and see the tunnels all around me
[01:17.329]Running into the dark underground
[01:21.569]All the subways around create a great sound
[01:25.890]To my motion fatigue: farewell
[01:31.328]With your ear to a seashell
[01:34.159]You can hear the waves in underwater caves
[01:41.469]As if you actually were inside a saltwater room
[01:45.199]
[01:54.290]Time together is just never quite enough
[01:59.119]When you and I are alone, I’ve never felt so at home
[02:03.119]What will it take to make or break this hint of love?
[02:07.530]We need time, only time
[02:12.330]When we're apart whatever are you thinking of?
[02:16.100]If this is what I call home, why does it feel so alone?
[02:20.290]So tell me darling, do you wish we'd fall in love?
[02:25.020]All the time, all the time
[02:28.979]Can you believe that the crew has gone
[02:34.790]and wouldn't let me sign on?
[02:37.920]All my islands have sunk in the deep,
[02:41.940]so I can hardly relax or even oversleep
[02:46.060]I feel as if I were home some nights
[02:52.180]when we count all the ship lights
[02:53.700]I guess I'll never know why sparrows love the snow
[02:58.270]We'll turn off all of the lights and set this ballroom aglow
[03:04.200]~~So tell me darling, do you wish we’d fall in love?~~
[03:14.690]Time together is just never quite enough
[03:18.740]When you and I are alone, I’ve never felt so at home
[03:22.470]What will it take to make or break this hint of love?
[03:26.490]We need time, only time
[03:31.870]When we’re apart whatever are you thinking of?
[03:35.290]If this is what I call home, why does it feel so alone?
[03:39.130]So tell me darling, do you wish we’d fall in love?
[03:44.360]All the time, all the time
[03:50.820]
[04:06.300]Time together is just never quite enough
[04:10.960]When we’re apart whatever are you thinking of?
[04:14.340]What will it take to make or break this hint of love?
[04:17.669]So tell me darling, do you wish we’d fall in love?
[04:25.960]All the time
